name: To Go off on Your Own is to be Part of the Whole
description:
Video feedback composition. I don't know, this thing happens to me when I'm working with feedback that makes me feel like magic and science perfectly intertwine. It is as if I can find moments that seem to replicate the natural order of our world so perfectly. I watch the little blobs of color trying to separate, individualize and go on their own journey. But they are forever connected to the amorphous blob that birthed them. What is the difference between the individual and the collective? We are just some souls swimming in a fish bowl and I think that's ok as long as we keep swimming. 

Yes, all this from video feedback.
